comments.raw_text:
A custom toolbar is not displayed on second a window on a major update from Firefox 3.5.17 to Firefox 4.0 RC1.
Prerequisites:
Have 2 Firefox Windows open, with an added Custom Toolbar.

Steps To Reproduce
1.Help > Check for Updates
2.Install the update

Expected Results:
2.Firefox restarts, and both windows have the custom toolbar

Actual Results:
2.Firefox restarts, and only one window has the custom toolbar

I experience this problem as well, with Firefox 4.0 under Ubuntu 10.10, whith a freshly regenerated localstore.rdf. However, it does not seem to happen at strictly every launch.

This still happens even though I changed ownership of localstore.rdf to root.

this bug might be related to #612928, #642440, #633250, #644975 or #645971. I attached my own localstore.rdf to he first bug in this list.
